page.title: 04Occupations,Kinbrace
page.content: Several people do two or three jobs.Most of the occupations are connected with the estates in which a shepherd,two handymen and a gamekeeper are employed.Their wives have seasonal jobs in the shooting lodges.The shop keeper is a school transport driver and a postmaster.His wife also drives school transport. Another man is postman, garage mechanic and snow plough driver.Five people are retired. One was a gamekeeper another a shepherd and his wife.One lady was a school teacher who came from England to live here.The other was a postmistress at Kinbrace for many years.There are three teenagers.They all attend Golspie High School and come home at the weekends.There is a teenager who works in the peat factory at Forsinard and two boys who are in our school.
